item.title: 【学习记录】探索Nest 的Controller如何返回代码片段，结合hyperview
item.author: 作者
item.description: 遇到的第一个错误 返回错误 代码内容 view/components/tabContent.hbs <text>I am tab content</text> modules/demo/demo.controller.ts @Controller('demo/demo') export class DemoController { constructor(private readonly demoService: DemoService) {} @Get('tabContent') @Render('components/tabContent') getTabContent(@Res() res: Response) { console.log(res.req.query); return {}; } } view/page.hbs <view trigger="press" target="tabTarget" href="https://mengsha97.github.io/demo/demo/tabContent" action="replace-inner"></view> <view id="tabTarget" style="flex-1"></view>
